data.name: Redmatch 2 - Fashionable Attire DLC
data.detailed_description:
A cosmetic-only content pack featuring various hats.

DLC Content:
  • Top hat
  • Halo hat
  • Propeller hat
  • Googly eyes hat
  • Horns hat
  • Traffic Cone hat

The Horns hat grows bigger every time you get a kill, and resets when you die.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Hungarian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Italian, Bulgarian, Danish, Greek, Norwegian, Portuguese, Romanian, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
